attributes.action: make it unlawfull to discriminate against people because of their membership of political organizations that are considered to be politically incorrect by some.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to get involved in politics by becoming a member of the BNP. At present I would probably be sacked by my employers if I did as I work for the Home office. This has happened to others and is a worry that we dont need and it is just because there are some people who think it is  racist. It isnt and neither am I.
